name: Attain
headline: One-Stop Shop for Convenience Store Inventory
description:
Attain is a one-stop shop for convenience store owners to buy inventory across all their suppliers with higher reliability, price transparency, and product discovery.

On average, store owners buy products from over 10-15 different suppliers each week. This painful process involves shopping in massive warehouses or spending hours working with wholesaler’s sales representatives (who sometimes don’t even show up). As a result, stores waste countless hours ordering products through extremely inefficient and tedious processes. These store owners are also severely impacted by inventory shortages and revenue loss which many times results in them downsizing their business or shutting them down completely.

Attain solves this problem by providing a single app to purchase products across all of their suppliers, resulting in a one-stop shop for inventory. By aggregating inventory across a multitude of suppliers and wholesalers, Attain helps stores save significant time and money while allowing them to focus on what they do best - growing their businesses.

Feel free to reach out at founders@joinattain.com!
tags: industry:marketplace; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:supply-chain; industry:food-tech; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Aamir Hudda, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CEO of Attain
Ex-Product @ Meta, eBay
Computer Science & Business @ Berkeley
Passionate sneakerhead and traveler

founders.name: Joseph Yeh, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CTO of Attain
Ex-Engineering at Amazon, Shell, Soma, 3x YC Companies
Compute Science & Math @ Berkeley
Hobbies: Working out + poker

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Attain**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from the vibrant startup scene of Berkeley, CA, Attain is a cutting-edge solution in the convenience store sector. As part of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch, Attain caters to convenience store owners by offering a streamlined platform to purchase inventory across multiple suppliers. No more endless trips to warehouses or frustrating interactions with unresponsive sales reps. Attain makes it possible to manage supply chain logistics directly from a single app.

**Mission**

Attain's mission is clear: to be the one-stop shop for convenience store inventory needs. The company recognizes that store owners typically juggle between 10-15 suppliers weekly, wasting time and often facing inventory shortages that can severely impact their business. By consolidating inventory access, Attain helps businesses save time, reduce costs, and focus on growth instead of administrative burdens.

**Key Features**

- **Efficiency**: Say goodbye to tedious processes like paper invoices and phone orders. Attain offers a modern, personalized app that simplifies ordering and management.
- **Sales Increase**: Users can potentially boost their sales by 20% on every order placed through the platform.
- **Convenience**: With all operations centralized, store owners can focus on what they do best—running their businesses.

**Team and Structure**

Attain operates with a compact team of two, ensuring agility and adaptability in its operations. The group is guided by their founder, Nan, who steers the company through innovation and a strong focus on customer needs.

**Market Position and Tags**

Attain is tagged in several segments, including marketplace, SaaS (Software as a Service), B2B (business-to-business), supply-chain, food-tech, and is notably positioned in the San Francisco Bay Area—a hotbed for tech innovations.

**Contact and Engagement**

Attain is eager to connect with potential users and distributors. Interested parties can reach out via email at founders@joinattain.com or schedule a demo through their website at [joinattain.com](https://joinattain.com).

In summary, Attain is not just about selling products; it’s about transforming the way convenience store owners procure their inventory. By harnessing technology to create efficiency and improve profitability, Attain is poised to reshape a traditionally cumbersome process into a seamless experience—one that truly allows small businesses to thrive.
